contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 30, 1930 D Markinch Contest
Markinch Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Markinch Contest markinch-contest
None
Markinch, Fife, Scotland, UK 1st prize £12, 2nd prize £8, 3rd prize £5, 4th prize £3, 5th prize £2. Best cornet Tullis Russell. Best trombone Tullis Russell. Best euphonium Wellesley Colliery. Promoted by the Markinch Horticultural Society, and limited to bands from Fife. 11 bands competed.
May 18, 2012, 4:20 p.m. Dec. 11, 2018, 12:12 p.m.
1 Tullis Russell Mills John Haldane
2 Dysart Colliery Silver Band John Faulds
3 Wellesley Colliery Band William Pegg
4 Burntisland Silver Robert Rimmer
5 Buckhaven and District Miners' Charles Terris
Unknown Result Balgonie Colliery Unknown
Unknown Result Kelty & Blairadam Band Unknown
Unknown Result Leslie & District Unknown
Unknown Result Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Unknown
Unknown Result Townhill Silver Unknown
